MyBio Junction
SummaryIncluded librariesPackage variablesSynopsisDescriptionGeneral documentationMethods
Summary
MyBio::Junction - A junction object with features
Package variables
No package variables defined.
Inherit
MyBio::_Initializable
Synopsis
    # This is the main region object.
    # Represents a spliced region with introns and exons
    
    # To initialize 
    my $junction = MyBio::Junction->new({
        SPECIES      => undef,
        STRAND       => undef,
        CHR          => undef,
        START        => undef,
        STOP         => undef,
        NAME         => undef,
    });
Description
    The MyBio::Junction class descibes a genomic junction.

Methods code
_initdescriptionprevnextTop
sub _init {
	my ($self,$data) = @_;
	
	$self->set_species($$data{SPECIES});
	$self->set_strand($$data{STRAND});
	$self->set_chr($$data{CHR});
	$self->set_start($$data{START});
	$self->set_stop($$data{STOP});
	$self->set_name($$data{NAME});
	$self->set_slice($$data{SLICE});
	$self->set_extra($$data{EXTRA_INFO});
	
	return $self;
}
get_3pdescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_3p {
	my ($self) = @_;
	if ($self->get_strand == 1) {
		return $self->get_stop;
	}
	else {
		return $self->get_start;
	}
}
get_3p_3p_distance_fromdescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_3p_3p_distance_from {
	my ($self,$from_locus) = @_;
	return ($self->get_3p - $from_locus->get_3p) * $self->get_strand;
}
get_3p_5p_distance_fromdescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_3p_5p_distance_from {
	my ($self,$from_locus) = @_;
	return ($self->get_3p - $from_locus->get_5p) * $self->get_strand;
}
get_5pdescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_5p {
	my ($self) = @_;
	if ($self->get_strand == 1) {
		return $self->get_start;
	}
	else {
		return $self->get_stop;
	}
}
get_5p_3p_distance_fromdescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_5p_3p_distance_from {
	my ($self,$from_locus) = @_;
	return ($self->get_5p - $from_locus->get_3p) * $self->get_strand;
}
get_5p_5p_distance_fromdescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_5p_5p_distance_from {
	my ($self,$from_locus) = @_;
	return ($self->get_5p - $from_locus->get_5p) * $self->get_strand;
}
get_chrdescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_chr {
	return $_[0]->{CHR};
}
get_extradescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_extra {
	return $_[0]->{EXTRA_INFO};
}
get_locationdescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_location {
	my ($self) = @_;
	return $self->get_chr.":".$self->get_start."-".$self->get_stop.":".$self->get_strand;
}
get_namedescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_name {
	return $_[0]->{NAME};
}

sub get_slice {
	return $_[0]->{SLICE};
}
get_speciesdescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_species {
	return $_[0]->{SPECIES};
}
get_spliced_relative_3pdescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_spliced_relative_3p {
	my ($self) = @_;
	if ($self->get_strand == 1) {
		return $self->get_spliced_relative_stop;
	}
	else {
		return $self->get_spliced_relative_start;
	}
}
get_spliced_relative_5pdescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_spliced_relative_5p {
	my ($self) = @_;
	if ($self->get_strand == 1) {
		return $self->get_spliced_relative_start;
	}
	else {
		return $self->get_spliced_relative_stop;
	}
}
get_spliced_relative_startdescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_spliced_relative_start {
	my ($self) = @_;
	return $self->to_spliced_relative($self->get_start);
}
get_spliced_relative_stopdescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_spliced_relative_stop {
	my ($self) = @_;
	return $self->to_spliced_relative($self->get_stop);
}
get_spliced_start_relative_to_slicedescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_spliced_start_relative_to_slice {
	my ($self) = @_;
	
	if ($self->get_strand == 1) {
		return $self->get_spliced_relative_5p;
	}
	else {
		return $self->get_slice->get_exonic_length - $self->get_spliced_relative_5p - 1;
	}
}
get_spliced_stop_relative_to_slicedescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_spliced_stop_relative_to_slice {
	my ($self) = @_;
	
	if ($self->get_strand == 1) {
		return $self->get_spliced_relative_3p;
	}
	else {
		return $self->get_slice->get_exonic_length - $self->get_spliced_relative_3p - 1;
	}
}
get_startdescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_start {
	return $_[0]->{START};
}
get_stopdescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_stop {
	return $_[0]->{STOP};
}
get_stranddescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_strand {
	return $_[0]->{STRAND};
}
get_strand_symboldescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_strand_symbol {
	my ($self) = @_;
	if ($self->get_strand == 1) {
		return '+';
	}
	elsif ($self->get_strand == -1) {
		return '-';
	}
	else {
		return undef;
	}
}
set_chrdescriptionprevnextTop
sub set_chr {
	my ($self,$value) = @_;
	if (defined $value) {
		$value =~ s/>*chr//;
		$self->{CHR} = $value;
	}
}
set_extradescriptionprevnextTop
sub set_extra {
	my ($self,$value) = @_;
	if (defined $value) {
		$self->{EXTRA_INFO} = $value;
	}
}
set_namedescriptionprevnextTop
sub set_name {
	my ($self,$value) = @_;
	if (defined $value) {
		$self->{NAME} = $value;
	}
}
set_slicedescriptionprevnextTop
sub set_slice {
	my ($self,$value) = @_;
	if (defined $value) {
		$self->{SLICE} = $value;
	}
}
set_speciesdescriptionprevnextTop
sub set_species {
	my ($self,$value) = @_;
	if (defined $value) {
		$self->{SPECIES} = uc($value);
	}
}
set_startdescriptionprevnextTop
sub set_start {
	my ($self,$value) = @_;
	if (defined $value) {
		$self->{START} = $value;
	}
}
set_stopdescriptionprevnextTop
sub set_stop {
	my ($self,$value) = @_;
	if (defined $value) {
		$self->{STOP} = $value;
	}
}
set_stranddescriptionprevnextTop
sub set_strand {
	my ($self,$value) = @_;
	if (defined $value) {
		$value =~ s/^\+$/1/;
		$value =~ s/^\-$/-1/;
		$self->{STRAND} = $value;
	}
}
to_beddescriptionprevnextTop
sub to_bed {
	my ($self) = @_;
	
	my $strand = defined $self->get_strand_symbol ? $self->get_strand_symbol : '.';
	my $name = defined $self->get_name ? $self->get_name : ".";
	
	return join("\t",(
		'chr'.$self->get_chr,
		$self->get_start,
		$self->get_stop + 1,
		$name,
		0,
		$strand
	));
}
to_spliced_relativedescriptionprevnextTop
sub to_spliced_relative {
	my ($self, $abs_pos) = @_;
	
	if (defined $self->get_slice and $self->get_slice->is_position_within_exon($abs_pos)) {
		my $relative_pos = $abs_pos - $self->get_slice->get_start;
		my $introns = $self->get_slice->get_introns;
		foreach my $intron (@$introns) {
			if ($intron->get_stop < $abs_pos) {
				$relative_pos -= $intron->get_length;
			}
			else {
				last;
			}
		}
		return $relative_pos;
	}
	else {
		return undef;
	}
}
to_stringdescriptionprevnextTop
sub to_string {
	my ($self,$method,@attributes) = @_;
	
	if ($method eq "BED") {
		return $self->to_bed;
	}
	else {
		return $self->get_location;
	}
}
